Package ui.input.selection

Interface SelectionHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MenuItem, SelectableBufferedSection, SelectableResponsiveSection, SelectableSection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AIPlayerConfig, Button, ChangeViewButton, ClientPlayerConfig, Dialog, DrawableSelectableBufferedSection, DrawableSelectableSection, ExitButton, ExitButton, Game, Game.ExitToMenuButton, Game.GameFinishedDialog, Game.PauseButton, Game.PauseMenu, Game.PauseMenuResumeButton, GameBoard, GameBoard.PromotionIndicator, GameMenu, GameStartButton, Hand, Hand.BorderedPiece, HumanPlayerConfig, LabeledMenuItem, Menu, MenuButton, MenuString, MinimumSize, MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog, MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog.Dialog, MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog.TooSmallMessage, OnlinePlayerConfig.PortBox, OptionChooser, Piece, Player.ConfigButton, PlayerConfig, PlayerConfig.NamedPlayerConfig, SelectableBorderedSection, SelectableBufferedGrid, SelectableCentredSection, SelectableGrid, SelectableMinimumSizeSection, SelectableResponsiveBorderedSection, ServerPlayerConfig, SocketPlayer.ServerPlayer.ConnectingMessage, TextBox, UnselectableBufferedSection, UnselectableResponsiveSection, UnselectableSection
    public interface SelectionHandler
    Can be selected by the user. Has actions defined for all directions, as well as for focus and selection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      KeyHandler focus​(KeyHandler current)
      Called when this element is focused.
      KeyHandler primaryNext​(KeyHandler current)
      Called when the user signals to move forward in the primary direction.
      KeyHandler primaryPrevious​(KeyHandler current)
      Called when the user signals to move backwards in the primary direction.
      KeyHandler secondaryNext​(KeyHandler current)
      Called when the user signals to move forwards in the secondary direction.
      KeyHandler secondaryPrevious​(KeyHandler current)
      Called when the user signals to move backwards in the secondary direction.
      KeyHandler select​(KeyHandler current)
      Called when the user selects this element.

    • Method Detail

      • primaryNext

        KeyHandler primaryNext​(KeyHandler current)
        Called when the user signals to move forward in the primary direction.
        Parameters:
        current - The current KeyHandler.
        Returns:
        The KeyHandler to return (could be the next element in the direction, or next option in the direction, etc).

      • primaryPrevious

        KeyHandler primaryPrevious​(KeyHandler current)
        Called when the user signals to move backwards in the primary direction.
        Parameters:
        current - The current KeyHandler.
        Returns:
        The KeyHandler to return (could be the next element in the direction, or next option in the direction, etc).

      • secondaryNext

        KeyHandler secondaryNext​(KeyHandler current)
        Called when the user signals to move forwards in the secondary direction.
        Parameters:
        current - The current KeyHandler.
        Returns:
        The KeyHandler to return (could be the next element in the direction, or next option in the direction, etc).

      • secondaryPrevious

        KeyHandler secondaryPrevious​(KeyHandler current)
        Called when the user signals to move backwards in the secondary direction.
        Parameters:
        current - The current KeyHandler.
        Returns:
        The KeyHandler to return (could be the next element in the direction, or next option in the direction, etc).

      • select

        KeyHandler select​(KeyHandler current)
        Called when the user selects this element.
        Parameters:
        current - The current KeyHandler.
        Returns:
        The KeyHandler to return (could be a different key handler for e.g. entering text).

      • focus

        KeyHandler focus​(KeyHandler current)
        Called when this element is focused.
        Parameters:
        current - The current KeyHandler.
        Returns:
        The KeyHandler to return (normally this element's movement selection handler).
